Conjuration 6

Shark Attack
Combat
W3
spell id [id]: 803
effect number [effect_number]: 81
damage [damage]: 78
spec [spec]: 41943040
casting time [casttime]: 250%
number of effects [nreff]: 1
fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 300-
gems required [gemcost]: 3W
Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Shark Attack
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok], Use Underwater Only [uwonly])
The caster attracts sharks to the smell of blood in the water. For the duration of the battle, there is a chance that a shark will arrive whenever a living being is wounded. The sharks are stupid, but the spell is strong enough to make them attack enemies more often than friends.
